title: Authorizes distinctive license plates to be issued to Hispanic and African-American veterans
summary: Authorizes distinctive license plates to be issued to Hispanic and African-American veterans.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2959

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 21, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. WRIGHT -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Transportation

       AN  ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to distinctive
         license plates for Hispanic and African-American veterans

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  vehicle  and  traffic law is amended by adding a new
    2  section 404-x to read as follows:
    3    S 404-X. DISTINCTIVE PLATES FOR HISPANIC OR AFRICAN-AMERICAN VETERANS.
    4  1. ANY HISPANIC OR  AFRICAN-AMERICAN  VETERAN  RESIDING  IN  THIS  STATE
    5  SHALL, UPON REQUEST, BE ISSUED A LICENSE PLATE BEARING THE WORDS HISPAN-
    6  IC  OR  AFRICAN-AMERICAN  VETERAN,  RESPECTIVELY.  APPLICATION  FOR SAID
    7  LICENSE PLATE SHALL BE FILED WITH THE  COMMISSIONER  IN  SUCH  FORM  AND
    8  DETAIL AS THE COMMISSIONER SHALL PRESCRIBE.
    9    2. THE DISTINCTIVE PLATE AUTHORIZED HEREIN SHALL BE ISSUED UPON PROOF,
   10  SATISFACTORY  TO  THE COMMISSIONER, THAT THE APPLICANT IS AN HISPANIC OR
   11  AFRICAN-AMERICAN VETERAN.
   12    3. A DISTINCTIVE PLATE ISSUED PURSUANT TO THIS SECTION SHALL BE ISSUED
   13  IN THE SAME MANNER AS OTHER NUMBER PLATES UPON PAYMENT  OF  THE  REGULAR
   14  REGISTRATION FEE PRESCRIBED BY SECTION FOUR HUNDRED ONE OF THIS ARTICLE,
   15  PROVIDED,  HOWEVER,  THAT  NO  SERVICE  CHARGE SHALL BE CHARGED FOR SUCH
   16  PLATE.
   17    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02928-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to distinctive license plates for Hispanic and African-American veterans
